hero.intro: I'm a Full-Stack Code Warden mastering the arts of C++, Node, and React.

about.title: The Backstory
about.heading: Quest: Building Digital Experiences
about.mission: Every hero needs an origin story. Mine involves turning caffeine into code and bugs into features.
about.about: I’m a self-taught software engineer passionate about building reliable, scalable, and user-focused applications. My main focus is backend development, where I enjoy designing APIs, managing databases, and optimizing system performance. I have a strong foundation in web technologies, cloud principles, and computer networking, which helps me create secure and efficient systems. Driven by curiosity and problem-solving, I’m constantly learning new tools and frameworks to expand my technical expertise and turn ideas into impactful software.
